body: another favorite type art but worst script artist again.

@nhcasual I know what you mean. The more I read it, the more confusing it gets. As Hayakawa-san and Kuronami-san share the nearly exact some character design. Somehow I have the suspicion as if the author wanted to create a NTR and coming of age story with his beloved character creation but didn't wanted to sully his waifu creation and therfore crated a new look-a-like character to make something like a what-if-scenario but without pulling the plot device of the previous work, where everything in the end was just the fantasy of the mischievous pervert Kuronami-san.
@Feuerteufel Oh I see, thanks for telling me, she REALLY looks like her so I was confused

@nhcasual, No, the female protagonist of the NTR story is a new character called Hayakawa-san. The protagonist of the previous work was Kuronami-san. The volume is a little bit confusing as the special story about Kuronami-san bathing in the river and ending up masturbating was mixed into the pages about the story of Hayakawa-san, aka the slut who cheats on her boyfriend with some alpha.
Translation would be interesting on this one. She seems to take responsibility after falling and not resisting imo, a bitch though.
Is this the same girl from this artist's previous works?
